title: MK-F417XX3
short_description: Short prototype about moving an invulnerable robot by moving its feet separately.
description: Alien menace has been growing, quite literally. Now they are planning to use gigantic aliens on their attacks.
It' up to Earth's two best mecha pilots to face it. Call a friend, synchronize your movements and move toward victory!
Also, be sure the listen to what the commander has to say, in case things go wrong.
